event.title: year 2000 U.S. Census. It is included

data.event: The population was 517 during the year 2000 U.S. Census. It is included in the Owensboro metropolitan area.
The first community at the site was known as Crossroads, but the post office established in 1852 was named Social Hill.
In 1854, George L. Helm platted the town and renamed it Sacramento.
The city was incorporated on October 8, 1860, and the post office followed suit the next year.
The city was incorporated on October 8, 1860, and the post office followed suit the next year.
Nicknamed "Forrest's First Fight", the Battle of Sacramento took place on December 28, 1861.
